Early Childhood Education; focus on inclusive practices, developmental assessment, family engagement.  Salisbury University – B.S. Early Childhood Education; child development, observation, curriculum development, CDA aligned. programs.ircs: Child Development Associate (CDA) Credential – National credential; requires portfolio, exam, and professional observation.  NAEYC Professional Standards / Competencies – ethical guidelines, professionalism, developmental practices.  Head Start Early Learning Outcomes Framework (ELOF) – developmental benchmarks for social, emotional, cognitive, language, and physical domains.  Common Core State Standards (CCSS) – early literacy and numeracy readiness.  State-specific Early Learning Standards – aligns programs with Maryland and regional requirements.

programs.four_year: Towson University – B.S. in Secondary / K-12 Education; pedagogy, learner development, assessment, INTASC alignment.  UMD – B.S. in Teacher Education; integrates INTASC, EdoTs, and Praxis Core; focus on classroom strategies and professional responsibilities.  University of Baltimore – B.S. in Education; instructional planning, learner assessment, ParaPro & Praxis alignment.  UMBC – B.A./B.S. in Education; INTASC, EdoTs, educational technology integration, classroom management.
programs.ircs: INTASC Standards – learner development, instructional practice, assessment, learning environment, professional responsibility.  Maryland Essential Dimensions of Teaching (EdoTs) – evaluation framework for teacher effectiveness.  ParaPro Certification – competency in reading, math, classroom support.  Praxis Core Academic Skills – reading, writing, math readiness for teacher prep.  Advance CTE Education Career Cluster Framework – instructional design, educational technology, diverse learners.  ISTE Standards for Educators – technology integration, digital citizenship.  AAQEP & CAEP Standards – educator program quality, clinical practice, program impact.

programs.community_college: Anne Arundel CC – Police Science / Criminal Justice Certificate; foundational law enforcement knowledge, community policing principles.  CCBC – Criminal Justice AAS; small-scale investigations, public safety operations.  Howard CC – Criminal Justice Certificate; law enforcement procedures, ethics, and career prep.
programs.four_year: Towson University – B.S. in Criminal Justice; applied policing, legal studies, and leadership.  University of Baltimore – B.S. in Criminal Justice; data-driven policing, community engagement, law & ethics.
programs.ircs: MPCTC Certification Standards, Community Policing Development principles, Law Enforcement Cadet Programs, LAPSEN guidance.

programs.community_college: PGCC – EMT Certificate; foundational emergency care, patient assessment, and Maryland EMS protocols.  Montgomery College – EMT/EMR Certificate; state-aligned EMS standards, first responder training.  Howard CC – EMT Certificate; hands-on clinical skills, emergency response procedures.
programs.four_year: UMGC – B.S. in Health Sciences / Emergency Services track; integrates EMS knowledge, leadership, and health care management.  Towson University – B.S. in Emergency Health Services (transfer-friendly); applied EMS, disaster response, public safety integration.
programs.ircs: MIEMSS state certification standards, NREMT National Certification, NHTSA EMS guidelines, OSHA safety standards, Hazardous Materials Awareness (NFPA 1001).

programs.community_college: PGCC – Emergency Response Certificate; disaster preparedness, ICS basics, and volunteer coordination.  Montgomery College – Emergency Response / Management Certificate; OSHA safety, hazard recognition, emergency planning.  Howard CC – Emergency Response Certificate; hands-on disaster drills, ICS application, volunteer coordination.
programs.four_year: UMGC – B.S. in Emergency Management; leadership in disaster response, hazard mitigation, and public safety systems.  Towson University – B.S. in Emergency Services / Public Safety; advanced emergency response, ICS leadership, and homeland security integration.
programs.ircs: FEMA ICS (Incident Command System), OSHA safety standards, CERT volunteer training, CHPP (Certified Homeland Protection Professional), IAEM CEM (Certified Emergency Manager) framework.

programs.community_college: PGCC – Fire & Rescue Certificate; state-aligned firefighting principles, emergency response, and EMS integration.  Montgomery College – Fire & Rescue / EMT Certificate; NFPA-compliant training, hazard awareness, OSHA safety.  Howard CC – Firefighter Certificate; practical firefighting skills, emergency response, hazardous materials handling.
programs.four_year: UMGC – B.S. in Emergency Management / Fire Services track; leadership, hazard mitigation, EMS, and public safety systems integration.  Towson University – B.S. in Fire & Emergency Services; advanced firefighting, leadership, and integrated emergency management.
programs.ircs: NFPA 1001 Firefighter I & II Standards, OSHA safety standards, MIEMSS EMR guidance, MFRI certifications, NREMT EMT certification, Hazardous Materials Awareness (NFPA), IFSTA instructional resources.
